verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of Egypt. <WH4714> Behold, <WH2009> the LORD <WH3068> rides <WH7392> on a swift <WH7031> cloud, <WH5645> and shall come <WH935> into Egypt: <WH4714> and the idols <WH457> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be moved <WH5128> at his presence, <WH6440> and the heart <WH3824> of Egypt <WH4714> shall melt <WH4549> in the middle <WH7130> of it.

And I will set <WH5526> the Egyptians <WH4714> against the Egyptians: <WH4714> and they shall fight <WH3898> every <WH376> one <WH376> against his brother, <WH251> and every <WH376> one <WH376> against his neighbor; <WH7453> city <WH5892> against city, <WH5892> and kingdom <WH4467> against kingdom. <WH4467>

And the spirit <WH7307> of Egypt <WH4714> shall fail <WH1238> in the middle <WH7130> thereof; and I will destroy <WH1104> the counsel <WH6098> thereof: and they shall seek <WH1875> to the idols, <WH457> and to the charmers, <WH328> and to them that have familiar spirits, <WH178> and to the wizards. <WH3049>

And the Egyptians <WH4714> will I give <WH5534> over <WH5534> into the hand <WH3027> of a cruel <WH7186> lord; <WH113> and a fierce <WH5794> king <WH4428> shall rule <WH4910> over them, said <WH5002> the Lord, <WH113> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>
And the waters <WH4325> shall fail <WH5405> from the sea, <WH3220> and the river <WH5104> shall be wasted <WH2717> and dried <WH3001> up.

And they shall turn <WH2186> the rivers <WH5104> far away; and the brooks <WH2975> of defense <WH4692> shall be emptied <WH1809> and dried <WH2717> up: the reeds <WH7070> and flags <WH5488> shall wither. <WH7060>

The paper <WH6169> reeds by the brooks, <WH2975> by the mouth <WH6310> of the brooks, <WH2975> and every <WH3605> thing sown <WH4218> by the brooks, <WH2975> shall wither, <WH3001> be driven <WH5086> away, and be no <WH369> more.

The fishers <WH1771> also shall mourn, <WH578> and all <WH3605> they that cast <WH7993> angle <WH2443> into the brooks <WH2975> shall lament, <WH56> and they that spread <WH6566> nets <WH4364> on the waters <WH4325> shall languish. <WH535>
Moreover they that work <WH5647> in fine <WH8305> flax, <WH6593> and they that weave <WH707> networks, <WH2355> shall be confounded. <WH954>
And they shall be broken <WH1792> in the purposes <WH8356> thereof, all <WH3605> that make <WH6213> sluices <WH7938> and ponds <WH99> for fish. <WH5315>

Surely <WH389> the princes <WH8269> of Zoan <WH6814> are fools, <WH191> the counsel <WH6098> of the wise <WH2450> counsellors <WH3289> of Pharaoh <WH6547> is become <WH1197> brutish: <WH1197> how <WH349> say <WH559> you to Pharaoh, <WH6547> I am the son <WH1121> of the wise, <WH2450> the son <WH1121> of ancient <WH6924> kings? <WH4428>

Where <WH335> are they? where <WH645> are your wise <WH2450> men? and let them tell <WH5046> you now, <WH4994> and let them know <WH3045> what <WH4100> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> has purposed <WH3289> on Egypt. <WH4714>

The princes <WH8269> of Zoan <WH6814> are become <WH2973> fools, <WH2973> the princes <WH8269> of Noph <WH5297> are deceived; <WH5377> they have also seduced <WH8582> Egypt, <WH4714> even they that are the stay <WH6438> of the tribes <WH7626> thereof.

The LORD <WH3068> has mingled <WH4537> a perverse <WH5773> spirit <WH7307> in the middle <WH7130> thereof: and they have caused Egypt <WH4714> to err <WH8582> in every <WH3605> work <WH4639> thereof, as a drunken <WH7910> man staggers <WH8582> in his vomit. <WH6892>
Neither <WH3808> shall there be any work <WH4639> for Egypt, <WH4714> which the head <WH7218> or tail, <WH2180> branch <WH3712> or rush, <WH100> may do. <WH6213>

In that day <WH3117> shall Egypt <WH4714> be like to women: <WH802> and it shall be afraid <WH2729> and fear <WH6342> because <WH6440> of the shaking <WH8573> of the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> which <WH834> he shakes <WH5130> over <WH5921> it.

And the land <WH127> of Judah <WH3063> shall be a terror <WH2283> to Egypt, <WH4714> every <WH3605> one that makes mention <WH2142> thereof shall be afraid <WH6342> in himself, because <WH6440> of the counsel <WH6098> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> which <WH834> he has determined <WH3289> against <WH5921> it.

In that day <WH3117> shall five <WH2568> cities <WH5892> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> speak <WH1696> the language <WH8193> of Canaan, <WH3667> and swear <WH7650> to the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> one <WH259> shall be called, <WH559> The city <WH5892> of destruction. <WH2041>

In that day <WH3117> shall there be an altar <WH4196> to the LORD <WH3068> in the middle <WH8432> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and a pillar <WH4676> at <WH681> the border <WH1366> thereof to the LORD. <WH3068>

And it shall be for a sign <WH226> and for a witness <WH5707> to the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> in the land <WH776> of Egypt: <WH4714> for they shall cry <WH6817> to the LORD <WH3068> because <WH6440> of the oppressors, <WH3905> and he shall send <WH7971> them a savior, <WH3467> and a great <WH7227> one, and he shall deliver <WH5337> them.

And the LORD <WH3068> shall be known <WH3045> to Egypt, <WH4714> and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> the LORD <WH3068> in that day, <WH3117> and shall do <WH5647> sacrifice <WH2077> and oblation; <WH4503> yes, they shall vow <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> to the LORD, <WH3068> and perform <WH7999> it.

And the LORD <WH3068> shall smite <WH5062> Egypt: <WH4714> he shall smite <WH5062> and heal <WH7495> it: and they shall return <WH7725> even to the LORD, <WH3068> and he shall be entreated <WH6279> of them, and shall heal <WH7495> them.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be a highway <WH4546> out of Egypt <WH4714> to Assyria, <WH804> and the Assyrian <WH804> shall come <WH935> into Egypt, <WH4714> and the Egyptian <WH4714> into Assyria, <WH804> and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall serve <WH5647> with the Assyrians. <WH804>
In that day <WH3117> shall Israel <WH3478> be the third <WH7992> with Egypt <WH4714> and with Assyria, <WH804> even a blessing <WH1293> in the middle <WH7130> of the land: <WH776>

Whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> shall bless, <WH1288> saying, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be Egypt <WH4714> my people, <WH5971> and Assyria <WH804> the work <WH4639> of my hands, <WH3027> and Israel <WH3478> my inheritance. <WH5159>
